plot: Thousands of years ago the God of destruction ,Enka, died saying thats its child would destroy the world.Thousands of years later the potential children of Enka are found (some human , some not) and take part in the Peaceful Family Operation in order to discover who the true child of Enka is and stop them from destroying the world by teaching them the importance of family love.
opening_theme: "Chōsai Kenbo Sengen (超妻賢母宣言)" by MOSAIC.WAV
ending_theme: "Kyōran Senki~Nichijō no Kamisama~" (狂乱戦記 ～日常ノ神サマ～) by Ayumi Fujimura
"Wagahai wa Shougojuu de Aru ka?" (我輩は守護獣である、か?) by Hiroki Yasumoto and Marina Inoue
"Boku wa Koushin Saremashita" (ボクハ更新サレマシタ) by Ryou Hirohashi
"Sekai de Ichiban Yabai Koi~" (世界で一番ヤバイ恋～) by Haruka Tomatsu
"Appare Henka Ja." (あっぱれ変化じゃ。) by Rina Satou
"Codename wa Lady-X" (コードネイムはLady-X) by Yoshinori Fujita
"Hen na Kami-sama Shitteru yo" (ヘンな神さま知ってるよ) by Kana Hanazawa
